org.trianacode.taskgraph.service

Class QueueCable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.taskgraph.imp.CableImp
      • org.trianacode.taskgraph.service.QueueCable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Cable, NodeListener, InputCable, IOCable, OutputCable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataCable

    public abstract class QueueCable
extends CableImp
implements IOCable, java.io.Serializable, NodeListener
    A Local input/output implementation (i.e. implements IOCable) of the Cable class for local delivery of data between the nodes of the connected units of this cable.
    See Also:
    Scheduler, Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.trianacode.taskgraph.imp.CableImp

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect(Node sendnode, Node recnode)
      A local cable must be created by giving a reference to a RunnableInstance object so that wehen we use non-blocking sending of data we can notify the RunnableInstance object when each packet has finished

      Disconnect this cable from its nodes.
